name: LD45 - The Voodoo Slaughterhouse (PostLDVersion)
description:
Bacon Samedi is currently trapped in his nemesis : a Voodoo Slaughterhouse !! Help him escape this maze.

This building (surely built on top of an Indian burial ground) is preventing our hero from going through walls and doors and is cancelling almost all his powers. His last hope is to take control of innocent pigs to open himself a way to the outside.

Controls:

  • Arrows keys : Pig horizontal movement / Mask horizontal and vertical movement
  • Space : Jump
  • X : Take control of an innocent pig / Release an innocent pig
  • E : Clear pig from the path
